title: JSON schema for SAP.COPILOT Namespace
description: Represents specific attributes for SAP CoPilot

_version.description: Represents SAP.COPILOT attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

contextAnalysis.description: Settings for the context analysis features of SAP CoPilot

allowAddingObjectsFromAppScreenToCollect.description: Enable/Disable the ability for SAP CoPilot to analyze your Application Screens and add the found objects to a Collection

whitelistedEntityTypes.description: A list of the whitelisted EntityTypes, prefixed with their namespace, that SAP CoPilot can display. The empty list is ignored, thus allowing all EntityTypes by default.

digitalAssistant.description: Settings for the Digital Assistant features of SAP CoPilot

uri.description: Represents the uri of the intent

dataSources.description: A list of the sap.app.dataSources used by the intent

i18n.description: Represents the uri of the translation file
